1. 開 Andorid o既 "Settings" / "設定"
2. 最頂右手邊有個搜尋放大鏡 icon
3. 搜尋 "Notification" / "通知"
4. 禁 "Notification access" / "通知存取權"
5. 禁多次 "Notification access" / "通知存取權"
6. 將 Android Wear 設為 on
7. 去返 Android Wear 個 app turn on 埋 location access
8. 完

希望幫到你
